enspire. display. templates. BaseTemplate

enspire.display.BaseDisplayObject
enspire.display.templates.ITemplate
enspire.display.templates.BaseTemplate
enspire.display.alerts.AlertTemplate
enspire.display.templates.BulletList
enspire.display.templates.ListSimpleBullet

A base class for all ILE templates to extend from.  This class is dynamic to allow psuedo multiple class inheritance for dynamic registration

Summary
enspire. display. templates. BaseTemplate
A base class for all ILE templates to extend from.
